FILESBEFORECOPY:
<32Targets> cp </32Targets> <64Targets>
cp /usr/local/share/limine/limine-bios.sys ISO/boot/ cp /usr/local/share/limine/limine-bios-cd.bin ISO/ cp /usr/local/share/limine/limine-uefi-cd.bin ISO/ cp /usr/local/share/limine/BOOTX64.EFI ISO/EFI/BOOT

cp drivers/Networking/PCNET32/PCNET32.SYS ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/DRIVERS/PCNET32.SYS cp drivers/Audio/SoundBlaster/SBMOD.SYS ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/DRIVERS/SBMOD.SYS cp drivers/Audio/HDA/HDAPCI.SYS ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/DRIVERS/HDAPCI.SYS cp drivers/gpu/Virtualbox/VBOXGPU.SYS ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/DRIVERS/VBOXGPU.SYS cp drivers/gpu/VMWare/VMWGPU.SYS ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/DRIVERS/VMWGPU.SYS cp drivers/USB/HostDrivers/XHCI.SYS ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/DRIVERS/XHCI.SYS cp drivers/Audio/AC97/AC97.SYS ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/DRIVERS/AC97.SYS cp drivers/DMA/8237A/8237A.SYS ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/DRIVERS/8237A.SYS cp drivers/storage/AtaAcceleration/PIIX.SYS ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/DRIVERS/PIIX.SYS cp drivers/storage/Ahci/AHCI.SYS ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/DRIVERS/AHCI.SYS cp drivers/Serial/Ps2Bus/PS2IO.SYS ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/PS2IO.SYS cp drivers/Input/Keyboard/Mf2Ps2/MF2KBD.SYS ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/DRIVERS/MF2KBD.SYS cp drivers/Input/Mouse/Ps2Mouse/PS2MOUSE.SYS ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/DRIVERS/PS2MOUSE.SYS
cp DLL/LouDLLs/User32/user32.dll ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/USER32.DLL cp DLL/LouDLLs/GDI32/GDI32.DLL ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/GDI32.DLL cp DLL/LouDLLs/LouDLL/LouDll.dll ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/LOUDLL.DLL cp DLL/3rdParty/zlib/zlib1.dll ISO/ANNYA/ZLIB1.DLL cp DLL/LouDLLs/Codecs/codecs.dll ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/CODECS.DLL cp DLL/LouDLLs/MSVCRT/msvcrt.dll ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/MSVCRT.DLL cp DLL/LouDLLs/VCRUNTIME140/VCRUNTIME140.dll ISO/ANNYA/SYSTEM64/CRT140.DLL
cp EXE/AnnyaExp/AnnyaExp.exe ISO/ANNYA/ANNYAEXP.EXE cp EXE/AnnyaInit/AnnyaInit.exe ISO/ANNYA/ANNYAINIT.EXE
cp BackgroundImages/Annya.bmp ISO/ANNYA/PROFILES/DEFAULT/BG/ANNYA.BMP
cp SpriteAssets/Mouse.png ISO/ANNYA/MOUSE.PNG cp SpriteAssets/Folder.png ISO/ANNYA/FOLDER.PNG cp SpriteAssets/GB.png ISO/ANNYA/BUTTON.PNG cp SpriteAssets/AOSMC.png ISO/ANNYA/AOSMC.PNG cp SpriteAssets/AOSSET.png ISO/ANNYA/AOSSET.PNG cp SpriteAssets/Start.png ISO/ANNYA/START.PNG cp SpriteAssets/XBUTTON.png ISO/ANNYA/XBUTTON.PNG cp SpriteAssets/AOSPO.png ISO/ANNYA/AOSPO.PNG cp SpriteAssets/AOSPROG.png ISO/ANNYA/AOSPROG.PNG cp SpriteAssets/AOSODD.png ISO/ANNYA/AOSODD.PNG cp SpriteAssets/AOSHDD.png ISO/ANNYA/AOSHDD.PNG cp SpriteAssets/AOSETC.png ISO/ANNYA/AOSETC.PNG cp SpriteAssets/AOSEC.png ISO/ANNYA/AOSEC.PNG cp SpriteAssets/AOSEC.png ISO/ANNYA/AOSEC.PNG cp SpriteAssets/AOSCHIP.png ISO/ANNYA/AOSCHIP.PNG cp SpriteAssets/AOSTCD.png ISO/ANNYA/AOSTCD.PNG
